content.body: plinss/webidlparser being unmaintained is indeed starting to get quite painful. It'd be great to either maintain it or replace it. E.g. https://github.com/whatwg/webidl/pull/1211 has been blocked for over a month but multiple other specs are starting to build on it.

content.body: krosylight: Domenic: I don't think diagrams need to be part of the build. They're generated so rarely it seems kind wasteful. Having a script at hand to make changes easier should suffice in my opinion.
